content: Hello! My name is David Johnson and I am on staff with HL7. Are you planning or attending a FHIR community event? Please share the URL and dates of the event and I will include it on the calendar at https://www.hl7.org/FHIRCommunityEvents/ . Thank you!

David Johnson said:

Hello! My name is David Johnson and I am on staff with HL7. Are you planning or attending a FHIR community event? Please share the URL and dates of the event and I will include it on the calendar at https://www.hl7.org/FHIRCommunityEvents/ . Thank you!

@Brian Kaney take note. (Is Boston FHIR gonna do any virtuals?)

Hi @David Johnson, we have Nordics on FHIR events around monthly. Skype calls. Please sync with @Espen Stranger Seland for details. Next one is tomorrow: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/194447-nordics/topic/Nordics.20on.20FHIR.20-.20Call.20.237.20-.20May.202020/near/195022925
Thank you! I'll take a look.
Yes! Just started to get that ball going the other day, will keep you posted!

@David Johnson If you want to jump right in in five, here is the Skype meeting: https://meet.ehelse.no/espen.stranger.seland/31LHZHHW

And send me your email, so I can invite you to the next one.

@Espen Stranger Seland I understood @David Johnson was after a schedule for our calls, so the calls could be advertised in a HL7 events calendar. But we don't have a published schedule at the moment.
Would it be OK for you to add something like the following:

  • Name: Nordics on FHIR
  • Topic: discuss the use of FHIR in the Nordic countries, and related topics
  • Schedule: Each first Wednesday of the month
  • Details: Contact @Espen Stranger Seland

I really appreciate you sharing your information for inclusion on the calendar. The calendar is starting out slowly with limited features but will grow as we go. It is available for viewing at: http://www.hl7.org/FHIRCommunityEvents/

Is there anywhere, maybe on www.hl7.no or somewhere, that outlines the calls? I would be able to add the event of the call, indicate the topic as the title, and the calendar entry would link to the page with the detailed information
I have added the Virtual InterOpathon presented by MiHIN to the FHIR Community Events Calendar seen here: http://www.hl7.org/FHIRCommunityEvents/

With so many users on the system, I'd like to remind all of the FHIR Community Event calendar at https://www.hl7.org/FHIRCommunityEvents/. Please direct message me with your upcoming events and I'll work to include them on the calender.
I will make a semi-static landing page for the calls, so far I have only sent out email invitations and used the #nordics channel.
If you have any virtual or local FHIR events planned, please let me know and I will add them to https://www.hl7.org/FHIRCommunityEvents/ - Thanks!

How local are you interested in? For instance, HL7 Finland organises a Personal Health SIG workshop on May 26, 1 PM to 3:30 PM UTC+3. http://www.hl7.fi/sig-toiminta/personal-health-sig/ (description in Finnish).
:)
Mikail, Thank you for asking. I'll get right back with you!
@Mikael Rinnetm채ki I've added your event to https://www.hl7.org/FHIRCommunityEvents/ - Thank you!

I've added https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev/events/272108850/ on August 8th to https://www.hl7.org/fhircommunityevents/

Remember, please let me know about local community events for calendar consideration!

Hi! We are having a FHIR online programming contest starting today. Is it possible to share this information with FHIR developers? The details are described here: https://community.intersystems.com/post/welcome-intersystems-iris-health-fhir-contest-developers
well, you just did ;-), but you can also post a single notification - perhaps with just a little more information - to the #Announcements track

Grahame Grieve said:

well, you just did ;-), but you can also post a single notification - perhaps with just a little more information - to the #Announcements track

Thank you, @Grahame Grieve ! I've just tried and it says I can do it in 5 days, not earlier. Because I'm a new member I guess.
ah yes. well, I can post it. Either what you posted, or something with a little more information?

Grahame Grieve said:

ah yes. well, I can post it. Either what you posted, or something with a little more information?

Oh, thank you! Wanted to provide a bit more details like that: Hi FHIR developers! We are having a contest for FHIR developers and welcome you to build an application that uses InterSystems IRIS for Health FHIR Server. This is the online contest that will take place from 10th to 30th of August on the InterSystems Developers community. Everybody is very welcome! Learn more information here https://community.intersystems.com/post/welcome-intersystems-iris-health-fhir-contest-developers We have a kick-off webinar tomorrow http://eventbrite.com/e/116225065299

Grahame Grieve said:

ah yes. well, I can post it. Either what you posted, or something with a little more information?

thank you so much!!!

Evgeny Shvarov said:

ah yes. well, I can post it. Either what you posted, or something with a little more information?

We are having a contest for FHIR developers and welcome you to build an application that uses InterSystems IRIS for Health FHIR Server. This is the online contest that will take place from 10th to 30th of August on the InterSystems Developers community. Everybody is very welcome! The recording of the meetup is available [here] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4GGCxR5qMEc)

Oh, thank you! Wanted to provide a bit more details like that: Hi FHIR developers! We are having a contest for FHIR developers and welcome you to build an application that uses InterSystems IRIS for Health FHIR Server. This is the online contest that will take place from 10th to 30th of August on the InterSystems Developers community. Everybody is very welcome! Learn more information here https://community.intersystems.com/post/welcome-intersystems-iris-health-fhir-contest-developers We have a kick-off webinar tomorrow http://eventbrite.com/e/116225065299

The recording of the meetup is available [here] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4GGCxR5qMEc)

We had 5 submissions in the FHIR Contest https://openexchange.intersystems.com/contest/current! FHIR Patient Portal, Frontend apps, FHIR Analytics, and others! You are welcome to vote and choose the winner!
@David Johnson for FHIR community events, HL7 Finland organizes a webinar and the spring general assembly on 29 March, 2021, starting at 14:30 EEST (Europe/Helsinki, UTC+3).

@David Johnson There's a new monthly recurring call for #nordics, taking place each last monday of the month at 2 PM CET. See https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/194447-nordics/topic/Monthly.20Teams.20call/near/243751398 for details. Can we please get this added to the FHIR Community Events calendar?
@Eric Schmitt

@Mikael Rinnetm채ki Hi Mikael - I can add these events to the FHIR Community Events Calendar. The Calendar requires the following information to show an item on the calendar. Title of Event, Start Date, End Date, and Event URL. Could you send me these details and I will post them to the calendar. Eric@Hl7.org
